intro: Rostellularia rotundifolia, commonly known as the round-leaf rostellularia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, round leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests or near water bodies. Rostellularia rotundifolia is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
